translation.en: [woman 1] I want you to start with the night of August 6th, 2004.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你从2004年的8月6日晚上
‎开始讲起

translation.en: [woman 2] I was with Kut, a pimp.
translation.zh:
‎我当时和卡特在一起
‎他是一个皮条客

translation.en: He said that I needed to get some money.
translation.zh: ‎他说我需要弄点钱

translation.en: [man] This defendant shot Johnny Allen in the head, in his bed,
translation.zh:
‎被告开枪将乔尼·艾伦击毙在床上
‎正中其头部

translation.en: but gives a wild theory of how it was self-defense.
translation.zh: ‎却给出了此举是正当防卫的大胆辩解

translation.en: I shot him because I thought he was gonna shoot me.
translation.zh:
‎我开枪打他
‎是因为我以为他马上要开枪打我了

translation.en: We, the jury, find the defendant, Cyntoia Denise Brown,
translation.zh:
‎我们陪审团判定
‎被告辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗

translation.en: guilty, first-degree murder.
translation.zh: ‎一级谋杀罪名成立

translation.en: [woman 1] If you are a juvenile and you're convicted in Tennessee of first-degree murder,
translation.zh:
‎在田纳西州
‎未成年人被判一级谋杀的重罪

translation.en: the only two options are either true life without parole or 51 years.
translation.zh:
‎只有两种选择 终生监禁 不得保释
‎或者51年有期徒刑

translation.en: Hey, Mommy.
translation.zh: ‎喂 妈妈

translation.en: Well, I got life.
translation.zh: ‎我被判终生了

translation.en: [woman 3] Outside of the glass and the bars,
translation.zh: ‎在监狱玻璃探视窗和铁栏杆外

translation.en: we may never be like a mother and a daughter should be.
translation.zh:
‎我们可能永远都无法
‎像正常的母女那样相处

translation.en: Here's a kid who didn't have a chance.
translation.zh: ‎她只是一个没有机会的孩子

translation.en: She didn't have a chance before she was born...
translation.zh: ‎在出生之前 她没有机会…

translation.en: [woman 4] I got pregnant on my 16th birthday.
translation.zh: ‎我在16岁生日那天怀孕了

translation.en: I drank, and I was introduced to crack cocaine.
translation.zh:
‎我酗酒
‎有人把霹雳可卡因拿给我用

translation.en: My mother, we didn't live in a very stable home.
translation.zh: ‎我和妈妈没有生活在一个稳定的家中

translation.en: It came from genetics, and the genetics should stop.
translation.zh: ‎那是遗传的 这种遗传应该停止了

translation.en: Cyntoia Brown, in prison for more than a decade now,
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅·布朗目前已经在监狱中
‎度过了十几年

translation.en: her case is catching fire on social media.
translation.zh: ‎她的案子在社交媒体上突然火了起来

translation.en: [man 2] Cyntoia made the decision to seek the help of the governor
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅做出决定 寻求州长的帮助

translation.en: and petition for clemency.
translation.zh: ‎提交请愿 请求赦免

translation.en: [man 3] In 2004, she was considered a prostitute.
translation.zh: ‎在2004年 她被认为是妓女

translation.en: Today, she would be considered a victim of sexual predators.
translation.zh:
‎而现在 她会被认为
‎是性掠夺者的受害者

translation.en: She has made the most amazing transformation.
translation.zh: ‎她做出了最出色的转变

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I have come such a long way.
translation.zh: ‎这一路走来 艰难又漫长

translation.en: It's been a very long time.
translation.zh: ‎经历了这么多年

translation.en: When I was 16, I did a horrible thing,
translation.zh: ‎我16岁的时候 做了一件可怕的事情

translation.en: and I have carried that with me this whole time.
translation.zh: ‎这么多年 这件事情一直伴随着我

translation.en: I know that your decision is very serious.
translation.zh: ‎我知道您的决定非常认真

translation.en: I do pray that you show me mercy and that you give me a second chance.
translation.zh:
‎我殷切地祈祷您可以对我网开一面
‎再给我一次机会

translation.en: My name is Cyntoia Denise Brown.
translation.zh: ‎我的名字叫辛托娅·蒂尼斯·布朗

translation.en: I'm 16 years old.
translation.zh: ‎我今年16岁

translation.en: We are in Nashville, Tennessee
translation.zh: ‎我们正在田纳西州的纳什维尔市

translation.en: at the Davidson County Juvenile Detention Center.
translation.zh: ‎戴维森县少管所

translation.en: I was charged with homicide and robbery
translation.zh: ‎我被起诉蓄意杀人、抢劫

translation.en: and possession of a weapon and criminal impersonation.
translation.zh: ‎非法持枪、非法冒名顶替

translation.en: Most of my life, I've been feeling how everybody else wants me to feel
translation.zh:
‎我这辈子的多数时间中 ‎别人想让我有什么想法
‎我就是什么想法

translation.en: and saying what everybody else wants me to say.
translation.zh: ‎别人想让我说什么 我就说什么

translation.en: That's because I was so wanting to be loved
translation.zh: ‎因为我太想要被爱了

translation.en: because I really just never felt like anybody loved me.
translation.zh:
‎因为我真的从来没有感觉到
‎有人爱过我

translation.en: I wasn't happy at home. I was stressed out all the time.
translation.zh:
‎我在家里并不开心
‎一直都有很大的压力

translation.en: It just kind of wears you out and tires you out, ages you, makes you grow.
translation.zh:
‎这种感觉让你疲惫不堪、筋疲力尽
‎让你变老成熟 让你被迫成长

translation.en: Old... tired, weary.
translation.zh: ‎老气横秋… 厌倦之至、疲惫不堪

translation.en: That's how I feel.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我的感觉

translation.en: I just keep setting myself up for failure.
translation.zh: ‎我随时准备好失败

translation.en: I fall every time, and each time I fall harder.
translation.zh: ‎我失败的时候 每次败得更惨的时候

translation.en: And I'd say this has been my hardest fall. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我都会说 这是我最惨痛的一次失败

translation.en: [woman] Cyntoia is charged with criminal homicide, especially aggravated robbery,
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅被控蓄意杀人
‎情节异常恶劣性抢劫

translation.en: a handgun possession, and criminal impersonation.
translation.zh: ‎非法持有手枪 以及非法冒名顶替

translation.en: The most serious of those being the criminal homicide charge.
translation.zh: ‎其中最严重的是蓄意杀人

translation.en: She's charged with an offense that happened on the night of August 6th,
translation.zh: ‎她被指控在8月6日晚杀害他人

translation.en: and she's been in here, in the Juvenile Justice Center,
translation.zh: ‎从8月8日以蓄意杀人罪被捕开始

translation.en: since August 8th when she was arrested by police on the charge.
translation.zh: ‎一直关在少管所

translation.en: The state has announced an intent to attempt to transfer her
translation.zh:
‎田纳西州宣布
‎有意将她转移到成人犯罪体系

translation.en: to the adult system to treat her as any other adult charged with homicide.
translation.zh:
‎让她作为成人
‎进行蓄意杀人罪的定罪

translation.en: [Sinback] In Tennessee, juveniles can be transferred on any charge if they're 16 or older.
translation.zh:
‎在田纳西州 少年罪犯年满16岁
‎不论罪行 都可能被转至成人体系

translation.en: Cyntoia is right there on the dividing line.
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅正好在年龄的分水岭这里

translation.en: We've had people in Tennessee as young as 12 years old before
translation.zh:
‎我们田纳西以前有过的年龄最小的
‎是12岁的少年罪犯

translation.en: transferred on homicide charges.
translation.zh: ‎因为蓄意杀人转至成人体系

translation.en: My job is to show the judge that Cyntoia is worth saving.
translation.zh:
‎我的工作是向法官展示
‎辛托娅是值得被救的

translation.en: In juvenile court, she would receive the services that she needs
translation.zh:
‎在少年法庭
‎她会得到需要的服务

translation.en: that will be identified by the doctors, I hope, after her psychological testing.
translation.zh:
‎我希望能在心理测试之后
‎由医生出具鉴定

translation.en: That's where Dr. Bernet and Dr. Walker really come in.
translation.zh: ‎这是博内特医生和沃尔克医生的工作

translation.en: They can identify what the problems are with Cyntoia,
translation.zh: ‎他们可以鉴定出 辛托娅有什么问题

translation.en: why she's acting the way she is and whether those problems can be treated.
translation.zh:
‎她为什么会出现这样的行为
‎这些行为是否有办法治疗

translation.en: [Bernet] Cyntoia has been seen by several different psychologists
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅已经见过了
‎几个不同的心理医生

translation.en: and different people conducting evaluations.
translation.zh: ‎几个不同的人对她进行了评估

translation.en: She's in even more trouble than anybody really ever imagined.
translation.zh:
‎她的情况
‎比我想象过的任何人都要麻烦

translation.en: Cyntoia, did somebody explain to you why I'm meeting with you today,
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅 有没有人给你解释过
‎我今天为什么来见你

translation.en: why we're having this evaluation?
translation.zh: ‎我们为什么要进行这个评估？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Because of what I did.
translation.zh: ‎因为我做过的事情

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的8

translation.en: You know, the purpose of doing this evaluation,
translation.zh: ‎做这个评估的目的

translation.en: it might be able to help you when you go to court.
translation.zh:
‎是它可能在你上法庭的时候
‎帮助到你

translation.en: I want to get straight...
translation.zh: ‎我们开门见山吧…

translation.en: who's in your family. You have sort of a complicated family.
translation.zh: ‎你家里都有谁 你的家庭有点复杂

translation.en: Yeah, my mom, Ellenette Brown.
translation.zh: ‎对 我妈妈 艾乐奈特·布朗

translation.en: -[Bernet] What kind of work does she do? -She's a teacher.
translation.zh: ‎她做什么样的工作？ ‎她是一名老师

translation.en: Gina, is this your biological mother?
translation.zh: ‎吉娜是你的生母吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是

translation.en: -Gina as in Gina-- -Georgina Mitchell.
translation.zh:
‎-吉娜的全名是…
‎-乔吉娜·米歇尔

translation.en: -How old is she, do you think? -She's probably 32.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得她多大年龄？ ‎应该是32

translation.en: Yeah, do you know how to tell?
translation.zh: ‎对 你知道如何计算？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Because she had me when she was about 16. I'm 16.
translation.zh:
‎因为她怀我的时候是16岁
‎我今年16岁

translation.en: Right. That's right.
translation.zh: ‎对 没错

translation.en: Does that seem sort of funny to you that your mom was 16 and now you're 16?
translation.zh:
‎你母亲当年是16岁 你现在也是16岁
‎你会觉得这个巧合很讽刺吗?

translation.en: -Does that-- -[Cyntoia] I guess. I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-会不会觉得…
‎-有点吧 我也不好说

translation.en: -Does that seem sort of strange? -[Cyntoia] No.
translation.zh:
‎-会不会有点奇怪？
‎-有点吧

translation.en: [Bernet] Do you know anything about your dad?
translation.zh: ‎对于你父亲 你有任何了解吗？

translation.en: -[Bernet] Some people have mood swings. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎有些人会有情绪的波动

translation.en: [Bernet] Have you ever had that happen to you? Do you know what a mood swing is?
translation.zh:
‎你有发生过情绪波动吗？
‎你知道情绪波动是什么吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I have them all the time. -[Bernet] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-知道 我经常波动
‎-好

translation.en: Can you tell me about them? What happens when you have a mood swing?
translation.zh:
‎可以给我讲讲吗？
‎你情绪波动的时候 会怎么样？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] One minute, I'll be happy, and then I'll be depressed and sad and gloomy.
translation.zh:
‎前一秒还很开心
‎下一秒就抑郁、伤心、阴暗

translation.en: And then I'll be mad, and then I'll be back happy.
translation.zh: ‎然后会生气 再重新开心起来

translation.en: And then I'll be just kind of depressed...
translation.zh: ‎然后又会抑郁

translation.en: and different type of stuff like that.
translation.zh: ‎差不多都是这样 每次情况略有不同

translation.en: [Bernet] These times when you get real depressed and you cry nonstop,
translation.zh: ‎你非常抑郁 哭到停不下来的时候

translation.en: how long does that typically last?
translation.zh: ‎通常会持续多久？

translation.en: Does it last a day or week or two, three weeks?
translation.zh: ‎会持续一天、一周 还是两、三周？

translation.en: Anywhere from a day to hours to weeks.
translation.zh: ‎几个小时、一天、几周都是可能的

translation.en: The longest was for like a week and a half I cried.
translation.zh: ‎最长的一次 我哭了一周半

translation.en: What happens when you get real happy?
translation.zh: ‎你非常开心的时候 会怎么样？

translation.en: That's very often-- I mean, very rare that I get just real happy.
translation.zh:
‎经常开心啊
‎但我我极少有非常开心的时候

translation.en: If I'm talking to someone and having a good conversation, I'll be happy.
translation.zh:
‎如果我和别人聊天
‎聊得很好 就会开心

translation.en: [Bernet] What about times you get real, real angry?
translation.zh: ‎你非常生气的时候呢？

translation.en: When I'm locked up.
translation.zh: ‎我被关起来的时候 就很生气

translation.en: I don't like people telling me do this, do that,
translation.zh:
‎我不喜欢
‎别人告诉我去做这个、做那个

translation.en: you need to do it this way, not the other way,
translation.zh: ‎你要这样做 不能那样做

translation.en: and you need to be like this,
translation.zh: ‎你要这样做 这样想

translation.en: you shouldn't think like this. I don't like it.
translation.zh:
‎不能那样想 ‎我不喜欢 他们这样能他妈搞疯我
‎我一点都忍不了

translation.en: It fucking drives me nuts, and I can't stand it.
translation.zh:
‎我不喜欢 他们这样能他妈搞疯我
‎我一点都忍不了

translation.en: Well...
I got a lot of information here, and I'm gonna have to talk to Dr. Walker.
translation.zh:
‎我得到了很多信息
‎我要和沃尔克医生聊聊

translation.en: And then I'm gonna talk to Kathy Evans,
translation.zh: ‎然后和凯西·伊凡斯聊聊

translation.en: and then we're going to try to do something that might help you out
translation.zh: ‎然后我会尽力做点什么 在法庭上

translation.en: when you go to court.
translation.zh: ‎能够帮到你

translation.en: Do you think you can?
translation.zh: ‎你认为 能帮到我吗？

translation.en: Cyntoia, this first thing I'd like you to do is kind of a test of your imagination.
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅 我想让你做的第一件事
‎是测试你的想象力

translation.en: I'm going to show you some pictures, some cards with pictures on them.
translation.zh: ‎我会给你看一些图片 卡片上有画

translation.en: I want you to make up a story about each picture.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你给每张图片编一个故事

translation.en: Please tell me what's happening in the picture,
translation.zh:
‎请告诉我图片里正在发生什么 ‎发生什么事导致了这一幕
‎这个故事会怎么样结束？

translation.en: what led up to the scene and how the story ends.
translation.zh:
‎发生什么事导致了这一幕
‎这个故事会怎么样结束？

translation.en: Tell me what the people are talking about and what they're feeling.
translation.zh:
‎告诉我图片中的人说了什么
‎他们有什么感受

translation.en: Use your imagination and remember there are no right or wrong answers, okay?
translation.zh:
‎发挥你的想象力
‎记住 答案没有对错之分 好吗？

translation.en: -Tell me a story about this one. -Oh, shit.
translation.zh:
‎-给我讲讲这张图片的故事
‎-靠

translation.en: I think she killed the little girl.
translation.zh: ‎我认为她杀了那个小女孩

translation.en: -[Walker] Say again. -She killed the little girl
translation.zh:
‎-你再说一次？
‎-她杀了那个小女孩

translation.en: because I see some blood or something right here, and now she's feeling bad.
translation.zh:
‎因为我看到这里有血迹之类的东西
‎她现在感觉不太好

translation.en: She's just realizing what she's done.
translation.zh: ‎她意识到了自己所做的事情

translation.en: Tell me a story about this one.
translation.zh: ‎给我讲讲这张图片

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Well, I think they just got to arguing.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他们在争吵

translation.en: And she really doesn't want him to kiss her,
translation.zh: ‎她不想被他亲

translation.en: but he's forcing her.
translation.zh: ‎但他在强迫她

translation.en: This slut is telling her to give her the money.
translation.zh: ‎这个荡妇在说 把钱给她

translation.en: This bitch is sitting back enjoying it. I hate people like that, swear to God.
translation.zh:
‎这个贱人在隔岸观火
‎我向上帝发誓 我痛恨这样的人

translation.en: And they're doing it because she's black.
translation.zh: ‎他们这样做 是因为她是黑人

translation.en: She probably was friends with these two girls.
translation.zh: ‎她可能以前和这两个女孩是朋友

translation.en: They just used her so they could get what they wanted out of her.
translation.zh:
‎他们只是在利用她
‎得到他们想从她身上得到的东西

translation.en: [Bernet] Did you talk to Dr. Walker this morning? [Sinback] I have not talked to him yet.
translation.zh:
‎-你今天早上和沃尔克博士聊了吗？
‎-我还没有和他聊

translation.en: He's drafted up some results here,
translation.zh: ‎他在这里写下了一些初步的结论

translation.en: but basically, the testing is totally consistent.
translation.zh:
‎但是基本上两次测试结果
‎是完全一致的

translation.en: On the testing, she was honest, and so in other words, it appeared to be valid.
translation.zh:
‎测试的时候 她是诚实的
‎也就是说 结果看起来是真实有效的

translation.en: The Roberts Apperception Test is the one where you show
translation.zh: ‎罗伯特统觉测验是一种给测试者

translation.en: the pictures of the situations, and the person makes up stories.
translation.zh:
‎展示不同情境的图片
‎让测试者编故事

translation.en: He said it was very striking. All her stories were chaotic,
translation.zh:
‎他说他很震惊
‎她编的所有故事都很混乱

translation.en: and none of them had a resolution.
translation.zh: ‎没有任何一个故事清晰、有头绪

translation.en: They were all violence, aggression,
translation.zh: ‎全都是暴力的、有攻击性的

translation.en: an unusual degree of negative emotion, anger, rejection.
translation.zh: ‎展现出异常的负面情绪 愤怒、排斥

translation.en: I mean, this is her view of the world.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 这就是她的世界观

translation.en: How did this manifest itself when this guy Johnny was killed?
translation.zh:
‎这在乔尼被杀的时候
‎是怎么显现的？

translation.en: See, I think that some of these characteristics affected the behaviors.
translation.zh: ‎我想她的一些性格影响了她的行为

translation.en: Her affect of instability, in other words, becoming suddenly frightened
translation.zh:
‎造成了她的不稳定
‎换句话说 对她所处的现状

translation.en: about the situation she was in and her paranoia.
translation.zh: ‎突然地恐慌 有被迫害妄想

translation.en: Now, what can we do with all this?
translation.zh: ‎那现在的情况 我们能怎么办？

translation.en: She's 16-and-a-half.
translation.zh: ‎她16岁半

translation.en: She is.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: So if she were to stay in the juvenile court,
translation.zh: ‎所以如果她要留在少年法庭

translation.en: she would be under the control of the juvenile court until she's 19.
translation.zh:
‎要在19岁之前
‎受到少年法庭的管理

translation.en: I think that would be long enough to help her get her situation under control.
translation.zh:
‎我认为这段时间足够帮她
‎控制住现在的状况

translation.en: She has a serious personality disorder which requires therapy
translation.zh: ‎她有严重的人格障碍 需要治疗

translation.en: in a good, wholesome residential program.
translation.zh:
‎需要在一个良好健康的
‎住宿项目中治疗

translation.en: Tomorrow, we're gonna be going to court,
translation.zh: ‎明天我们会上法庭

translation.en: but today, we're gonna have an opportunity to talk with her biological mother.
translation.zh:
‎但我们今天
‎有一个和她生母谈谈的机会

translation.en: So that's kind of-- That's a little bit unusual.
translation.zh: ‎这种情况有点特殊

translation.en: Cyntoia was given up for adoption about 14 years ago,
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅大约14年前被弃养

translation.en: and her biological mother had not seen her in all that time.
translation.zh: ‎此后 她的生母一直没有再见过她

translation.en: It would be helpful to know whether there's any kind of mental disorder
translation.zh: ‎如果能知道辛西娅亲生父母家族中

translation.en: among the biological family of Cyntoia.
translation.zh:
‎是否有任何的精神障碍疾病
‎会很有帮助

translation.en: It's really good to see you before the hearing
translation.zh:
‎在听审之前见到你们
‎我感到非常幸运

translation.en: because there are a few things that I wanted to find out or ask both of you about.
translation.zh: ‎因为我有几件事想问你们俩

translation.en: And I guess I'm kind of glad that you all could say hi to each other.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴 你们两个能互相问个好

translation.en: I guess you haven't really seen each other for a long time.
translation.zh: ‎我想你们应该很久没见了吧

translation.en: It's been a long time. Yes, it has.
translation.zh: ‎很久没见了 是的

translation.en: -[Burnet] Yeah. -Fourteen-and-a-half years.
translation.zh: ‎14年半

translation.en: Ms. Mitchell, I'll tell you what I would find helpful
translation.zh:
‎米歇尔女士 如果我能知道
‎你昨天见到辛托娅的时候

translation.en: is how things went yesterday when you saw Cyntoia. How'd that go?
translation.zh:
‎情况怎么样 会对她很有帮助
‎昨天的见面怎么样？

translation.en: I was real excited and real happy. And I had been waiting a long time.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很激动 非常开心
‎我期待了很久

translation.en: And I was just so glad to see her.
translation.zh: ‎我见到她太开心了

translation.en: I know Ellenette has provided for her, and I thank her for that.
translation.zh:
‎我知道艾乐奈特一直供养她
‎为此我非常感激她

translation.en: I’m glad you met. Was it like-- How long did y'all--
translation.zh:
‎很高兴你们母女见面了
‎你们聊了多久…

translation.en: [Mitchell] Oh, for a long time.
translation.zh: ‎很久

translation.en: Um, I could see, you know, the traits she has.
translation.zh: ‎我能看到她身上的特质

translation.en: It was like looking at me at that same age.
translation.zh: ‎就像看着她那个年纪的我自己一样

translation.en: The ups and downs, anger one minute, happy the next.
translation.zh: ‎情绪的起伏 前一秒愤怒 下一秒开心

translation.en: You know, she wanted to know about our side of the family and...
translation.zh: ‎她想了解我们这边的家人

translation.en: Let me just ask you about some family history stuff
translation.zh: ‎我问您一些家族史的情况

translation.en: because, you know, sometimes, when people have some sort of mental problem,
translation.zh: ‎因为有时候人们有精神问题

translation.en: sometimes it runs in families because of genetic things.
translation.zh: ‎是在家族中遗传下来的

translation.en: [Mitchell] My mom shot herself. She sent me next door
translation.zh:
‎我母亲是开枪自杀的
‎在我二年级的时候

translation.en: when I was in second grade,
translation.zh: ‎把我送给了隔壁邻居

translation.en: and she shot herself in the stomach.
translation.zh: ‎她开枪打中了自己的肚子

translation.en: My mom and her mom, both of them, they're drunks, suicidal.
translation.zh:
‎我母亲和外婆两个人都有酗酒问题
‎都是自杀

translation.en: She took a shotgun and blowed her chest away, killed herself.
translation.zh: ‎外婆是用猎枪击穿了自己的胸部自杀

translation.en: Your mom had a biological brother
translation.zh: ‎你母亲有一个亲哥哥

translation.en: who had some problems as well, mental health problems?
translation.zh:
‎他也有一定的问题
‎精神健康问题吗？

translation.en: I know about these, yeah. Um, all of them do.
translation.zh:
‎对 我知道这些事实
‎他们都有精神疾病

translation.en: And see, that's why I left, because...
translation.zh: ‎所以我才离开了 因为…

translation.en: I prayed to God that--
translation.zh: ‎我向上帝祈祷…

translation.en: I didn't wanna be like her. I didn't wanna be like none of 'em.
translation.zh:
‎我不想成为她那样
‎我不想成为他们那样

translation.en: [Burnet] Right.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Can you tell me what she was like then? What kind of baby was she?
translation.zh:
‎可以给我们讲讲 她以前什么样吗？
‎她是个怎样的孩子？

translation.en: [Mitchell] Oh, she was a good baby.
translation.zh: ‎她是个好孩子

translation.en: She was real good.
translation.zh: ‎真的很好

translation.en: It just got really hard, and I felt like I just... You know, I couldn't do it alone.
translation.zh:
‎后来照顾她越来越难
‎我感觉自己一个人无法承担

translation.en: -Eighteen months. -We had her off and on
translation.zh:
‎-18个月
‎-从她六个月开始

translation.en: since she was six months old.
translation.zh: ‎我们就断断续续抚养她

translation.en: [Burnet] What happened after that? I guess when she got in high school,
translation.zh: ‎之后发生了什么？她应该读了高中

translation.en: -or junior high, there were more serious-- -[Brown] Well, yes.
translation.zh:
‎-或者初中 出现了更严重的…
‎-对

translation.en: When it started was, she had gotten herself
translation.zh: ‎刚开始的时候 她让自己

translation.en: kicked out of regular school into alternative school.
translation.zh:
‎被普通学校开除了
‎于是她去读了非传统学校

translation.en: That was the first time she had initially run away
translation.zh: ‎那是她第一次逃跑

translation.en: because she was afraid to come home.
translation.zh: ‎因为她害怕回家

translation.en: And she was gone for, I think, maybe a few days.
translation.zh: ‎她离开了几天

translation.en: And she had someone to call me.
translation.zh: ‎让一个人给我打电话

translation.en: [Brown] I said, "Well, you know, that only lasts for a little while,
translation.zh: ‎我说：“外面只能住一段时间

translation.en: but your place is here at home. You have to go to school.
translation.zh:
‎你在家中的位置始终都在
‎你还是要上学

translation.en: You can't, at 12 years old--
translation.zh: ‎你才12岁 不能…

translation.en: There's no way in the world you could take care of yourself."
translation.zh: ‎你不可能照顾自己的”

translation.en: So, of course she agreed, you know, and she came home.
translation.zh: ‎所以她当然同意了 她就回家了

translation.en: And then from that point on, it was just like every day,
translation.zh: ‎从那时候开始 就会每天一次

translation.en: every other day, every month, every other month,
translation.zh: ‎隔天一次 每个月一次 隔几个月一次

translation.en: it was just something, just something constantly. Constantly.
translation.zh: ‎就开始不断地反复搞出点事情

translation.en: -Meaning more and more behavior problems? -[Brown] More and more.
translation.zh:
‎-你是说 有了越来越多的行为问题？
‎-越来越多

translation.en: It's like the behavior problems,
translation.zh: ‎行为问题就好像…

translation.en: that wasn't even the tip of the iceberg,
translation.zh: ‎只是冰山一角

translation.en: because after that, she'd gone back to alternative school
translation.zh: ‎因为在那之后 她回到了非传统学校

translation.en: and then left school again, and the police called me.
translation.zh:
‎后来又离开学校
‎然后警察就给我打了电话

translation.en: [Brown] I think Cyntoia had just pretty well, at that point, made up her mind.
translation.zh:
‎我想辛托娅应该是在那时候
‎心中决定好了

translation.en: -I think it was too structured... -[Bernet] Right. ...for her, you know?
translation.zh:
‎可能对她来说
‎家中的生活安排太有秩序了

translation.en: And toward the end, she didn't want to be at home.
translation.zh: ‎到最后 她都不想回家了

translation.en: She had said to me that, "I knew I couldn't smoke, I couldn't drink."
translation.zh:
‎她对我说过
‎“我知道我不能抽烟、不能喝酒

translation.en: She said, "And I knew I couldn't get high because you wouldn't allow that."
translation.zh: ‎我知道不能吸毒 因为你不允许”

translation.en: I felt that this is what I had to do for me.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉 这是为了我自己 我必须做的

translation.en: Basically, the conversation that we just had here today,
translation.zh: ‎我们今天在这里的对话

translation.en: that's the exact conversation I want to have in court.
translation.zh: ‎基本就是我想在法庭上进行的对话

translation.en: If you guys could try to be as conversational as possible with the judge.
translation.zh:
‎我希望你们和法官说话的时候
‎尽量保持轻松的对话状态

translation.en: I think that you--
translation.zh: ‎我想 你们只要…

translation.en: I'm past it, you know. I mean...
translation.zh: ‎我的事已经过去了 你知道 我…

translation.en: -[Sinback] I'm very proud of you guys. -My past is my past, you know, and...
translation.zh:
‎-我很为你们骄傲
‎-我的过去已经过去了

translation.en: -[Sinback] Mm-hmm. -You know, I've moved on, you know, and...
translation.zh: ‎我已经放下了

translation.en: Like I said, I appreciate, you know, what she's done for Toia.
translation.zh: ‎我很感激她为辛托娅做的一切

translation.en: I'm sorry that, you know, she had to go through that with Toia, -the way Toia ended up. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎我很抱歉 她要和辛托娅经历这种事
‎我也很遗憾辛托娅变成这样

translation.en: -But you know... -[Bernet and Sinback] Yeah. ...my life wasn't easy either. And you know, it's a trait thing, I guess.
translation.zh:
‎但是我的人生也不容易
‎她可能是遗传了我

translation.en: [Burnet] The issue in juvenile court is whether Cyntoia should remain in juvenile court
translation.zh:
‎少年法庭的问题是
‎辛托娅是否应该留在少年法庭

translation.en: or whether she should be transferred to criminal court.
translation.zh: ‎还是应该被转移到刑事法庭

translation.en: If she stays in juvenile court, then she'll undoubtedly go
translation.zh:
‎如果她在少年法庭
‎无疑要在19岁前

translation.en: to some sort of juvenile detention facility until she's 19.
translation.zh: ‎在少管所关押

translation.en: If she is transferred to adult court,
translation.zh: ‎如果转移到成年法庭

translation.en: the only sentence that first-degree murder carries is life in prison.
translation.zh:
‎一级谋杀犯唯一的刑罚
‎就是终生监禁

translation.en: It's going to be an uphill battle.
translation.zh: ‎这将是一场艰苦的战斗

translation.en: Not only do I have to show
translation.zh: ‎我不仅要展示

translation.en: that Cyntoia has identifiable mental health problems
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅有明显的精神健康问题

translation.en: and circumstances that can be corrected.
translation.zh: ‎而且她的情况可以改好

translation.en: But I also have to show that it's worth doing that
translation.zh: ‎还要展示 她虽然杀了一个人

translation.en: in a case where a gentleman has been killed.
translation.zh: ‎但她还是值得被救的

translation.en: [Green] All right.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: We are here this afternoon, I believe, in the matter of Cyntoia Brown.
translation.zh:
‎我们今天下午在这里
‎是要处理辛托娅·布朗的问题

translation.en: It's my understanding this is set as a transfer hearing. Is that correct?
translation.zh: ‎这是一场转移听审会 对吧？

translation.en: -[Sinback] Yes, Your Honor. -[Brown] So are we ready to proceed?
translation.zh:
‎-是的 庭上
‎-我们可以开始了吗？

translation.en: -[man] Yes, ma'am. -[Sinback] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-是的 女士
‎-是的 女士

translation.en: -[Green] You are Cyntoia Brown? -[Cyntoia] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-你是辛托娅·布朗？
‎-是的 女士

translation.en: [Green] I have your date of birth listed as January the 29th, 1988.
translation.zh:
‎资料上写着
‎你的生日是1988年1月29日

translation.en: -Is that correct? -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-对吗？
‎-是的 女士

translation.en: -[Green] That makes you, what, 15? -Sixteen.
translation.zh:
‎-那你今年是15岁？
‎-16岁

translation.en: [Green] Sixteen. Do you understand why you're here?
translation.zh:
‎-你明白自己为什么在这里吗？
‎-明白 女士

translation.en: -Yes, ma'am. -[Green] All right.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: This is not a hearing to determine
translation.zh: ‎本次听审 不是为了判决

translation.en: if you're guilty or innocent of the charges against you.
translation.zh: ‎针对你被控的罪行 你是否有罪

translation.en: The only purpose of today's hearing
translation.zh: ‎今天的听审 唯一的目的

translation.en: is to determine where your case should be tried.
translation.zh: ‎是要决定你的案子要在哪里审理

translation.en: Whether it should be heard here in the juvenile court,
translation.zh: ‎后续要在本少年法庭听审

translation.en: or if your case should be transferred to the criminal courts
translation.zh: ‎还是转移到刑事法庭

translation.en: and you should be tried there.
translation.zh: ‎在那里进行审判

translation.en: [Sinback] I want you to start with the night of August 6th of 2004.
translation.zh:
‎我想让你从2004年的8月6日晚上
‎开始讲起

translation.en: Where did you begin that evening around seven o'clock?
translation.zh: ‎你那天晚上的七点钟左右 在哪里？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I was in the hotel room.
translation.zh: ‎我在一家宾馆的房间里

translation.en: -[Sinback] Okay, and who were you with? -Kut, Garion.
translation.zh: ‎好 你和谁在一起？ ‎卡特·盖里恩

translation.en: [Sinback] And who is Kut?
translation.zh: ‎卡特是谁？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Kut was someone that I was dating,
translation.zh: ‎卡特是我当时交往的人

translation.en: but he kind of turned into, like, what other people would look at as a pimp.
translation.zh: ‎但他变成了那种 别人眼中的皮条客

translation.en: [Sinback] Do you look at it as a pimp?
translation.zh: ‎你把他当作皮条客吗？

translation.en: During the time, no.
translation.zh: ‎当时没有

translation.en: Changes were happening so fast, I didn't.
translation.zh:
‎他的转变发生得太快
‎我当时没有那样认为

translation.en: [Sinback] What about now?
translation.zh: ‎现在呢？

translation.en: Yes, now that I look on the situation, I do.
translation.zh:
‎是的 现在我回想当初的情况
‎认为他是皮条客

translation.en: [Sinback] What were you doing with Kut in the motel room at the Intown Suites?
translation.zh:
‎在“市中心套房”这家宾馆的房间里
‎你当时在和卡特做什么？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] We were either getting high or having sex. That's all we ever did.
translation.zh:
‎我们不是在吸毒 就是在做爱
‎我们在那家宾馆里 只做这两件事

translation.en: [Sinback] What did he say to you that evening?
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上 他对你说了什么？

translation.en: He said that I was slipping and that I was starting to become a slouch,
translation.zh:
‎她说我开始堕落了
‎开始变成了一个懒女人

translation.en: that I needed to get out and get on my grind and get some money.
translation.zh: ‎说我需要出去工作赚钱

translation.en: When I left, I was looking for a ride so I could go out to East Nashville.
translation.zh:
‎我离开的时候
‎我想去搭顺风车去东纳什维尔

translation.en: [Sinback] Who were you going to see in East Nashville?
translation.zh: ‎你要去那里见谁？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I wasn't going to see particularly anyone.
translation.zh: ‎我不是要去见某一个特定的人

translation.en: I was going to an area that I knew was-- A lot of people go there and prostitute.
translation.zh:
‎我要去一个地方 我知道那地方…
‎很多人都会去做妓女

translation.en: [Sinback] Where did you walk to?
translation.zh: ‎你走路到了哪里？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I made it to the Sonic before someone asked me if I needed a ride.
translation.zh:
‎我走路到了音速餐厅
‎才有人问我 是否需要搭顺风车

translation.en: [Sinback] Okay. When you walked up to the Sonic, who approached you?
translation.zh:
‎你走到音速餐厅的时候
‎谁过来和你说话了？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] A man in a white truck.
translation.zh: ‎开白色卡车的一个男人

translation.en: [Sinback] Is this the person that has been referred to throughout this hearing?
translation.zh:
‎是这个
‎在今天听审中多次提到的人吗？

translation.en: -Mr. Allen, the deceased? -[Cyntoia] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-死者艾伦先生？
‎-是的 女士

translation.en: [Sinback] What did he say to you when he pulled up?
translation.zh: ‎他在你身边停车时 对你说了什么？

translation.en: He asked me if I needed a ride.
translation.zh: ‎他问我是否需要搭顺风车

translation.en: -[Sinback] What did you say? -I told him yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你说了什么？
‎-我说我需要

translation.en: The question came up, was I up for any action?
translation.zh: ‎我当时想 我准备好行动了吗？

translation.en: And the action, I guess you should know that it was insinuating sexual.
translation.zh: ‎这个行动 你们应该懂 暗示的就是性

translation.en: [Sinback] Did you know that when he said that? Yes, I did.
translation.zh:
‎-他说这话的时候 你知道吗？
‎-我知道

translation.en: [Sinback] And what was the next part of conversation?
translation.zh: ‎接下来的对话是怎样的？

translation.en: -[Cyntoia] Business. [laughs] -[Sinback] What did he say?
translation.zh: ‎生意 ‎他说了什么？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Well, he asked me how much, and I told him 200.
translation.zh: ‎他问我多少钱 我说二百

translation.en: And he said, "No, 100," and we decided finally on 150.
translation.zh:
‎他说：“不行 一百”
‎我们最后商量好150成交

translation.en: [Sinback] Where did you go next?
translation.zh: ‎你接下来去了哪里？

translation.en: We went to his house.
translation.zh: ‎我们去了他家

translation.en: [Sinback] Who made the suggestion of going to his house?
translation.zh: ‎是谁提出建议 要去他家的？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] He did. I had actually suggested the hotel we was right there at,
translation.zh:
‎他提的 我其实提议
‎去我们当时所在位置旁边的酒店

translation.en: but he didn't want to go to the hotel.
translation.zh: ‎但他不想去酒店

translation.en: He said he wanted to go to his house because there was no one there.
translation.zh: ‎他说想去自己家 因为他家没有人

translation.en: [Sinback] Did he tell you who he lived with or anything like that?
translation.zh:
‎他有没有告诉你
‎他和谁住在一起 或者类似的信息？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] He said he lived by himself.
translation.zh: ‎他说他自己一个人住

translation.en: [Sinback] You're in the car, you have your food, and you're on the way home.
translation.zh: ‎你们上了车 买了食物 开车回家

translation.en: What kind of conversation did you have?
translation.zh: ‎你们在车上聊了什么？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] He was just basically talking about himself
translation.zh: ‎基本都是他在说他是谁 是做什么的

translation.en: -and who he was, things that he did. -[Sinback] What did he tell you he did?
translation.zh: ‎基本都是他在说他是谁 是做什么的 ‎他告诉你 他是做什么的？

translation.en: He told me he was a real estate agent,
translation.zh: ‎他说他是房产中介

translation.en: and he said that he did a lot of volunteer work and stuff,
translation.zh: ‎说他做了很多志愿者工作

translation.en: and he was real important in the community.
translation.zh: ‎说他在社区中很重要

translation.en: He was just finished telling me about his accomplishments
translation.zh: ‎他刚讲完他的成就

translation.en: and saying how that he used to be in the Army,
translation.zh: ‎就开始说他以前在陆军服役的事

translation.en: because I mentioned that I was from Fort Campbell.
translation.zh: ‎因为我提到过 我来自坎贝尔堡

translation.en: And so he related to how he was an officer in the Army before
translation.zh:
‎所以他想到了
‎自己以前在陆军做军官的日子

translation.en: and that he was a sharpshooter in the Army.
translation.zh: ‎他在部队 是个神枪手

translation.en: And then he had told me how a lot of women want him for his money
translation.zh:
‎然后他告诉我
‎很多女人因为他的钱 想得到他

translation.en: and that he wanted someone to make love with him with desire.
translation.zh:
‎说他想要一个
‎能和他充满欲望做爱的人

translation.en: [Sinback] Okay. Did you see any guns in the house?
translation.zh: ‎你在他家看到有枪吗？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Yes, I seen two shotguns downstairs,
translation.zh: ‎有 我看到楼下有两支猎枪

translation.en: and he showed me a chrome gun with a black handle.
translation.zh:
‎他还给我看了一支
‎黑色手柄的库洛姆枪

translation.en: [Sinback] Where were you when he showed you that? [Cyntoia] I was sitting at the table, eating my food.
translation.zh:
‎-他给你看的时候 你在哪里？
‎-坐在桌子旁 吃我的食物

translation.en: [Sinback] Okay. And how were you feeling at that time?
translation.zh: ‎好 你当时有什么感觉？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] He was, like, controlling. He reminded me of Kut a little bit.
translation.zh:
‎他控制欲有点强
‎有点让我想起了卡特

translation.en: I start feeling nervous, then I kept feeling more nervous
translation.zh:
‎我开始觉得紧张
‎随着他谈论枪的事情

translation.en: as he started talking about the guns and stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我就越来越紧张

translation.en: I was really shaky.
translation.zh: ‎我当时非常颤抖

translation.en: [Sinback] Do you usually go with people to their homes?
translation.zh: ‎你经常和别人回家吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] No.
translation.zh: ‎没有

translation.en: [Sinback] Have you done this, prostituted before?
translation.zh:
‎-你以前做过妓女吗？
‎-做过

translation.en: -Yes. -[Sinback] Where have you done it?
translation.zh:
‎-你以前做过妓女吗？
‎-做过 ‎-你在哪里做的？
‎-在酒店

translation.en: -In hotels. -[Sinback] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-你在哪里做的？
‎-在酒店 ‎好

translation.en: And what did you do then?
translation.zh: ‎后来你们做了什么？

translation.en: I asked him if we can go downstairs to the living room and watch TV.
translation.zh:
‎我问他 我能不能
‎去楼下的客厅看电视

translation.en: -[Sinback] And what did he say? -He said sure.
translation.zh: ‎他说了什么？ ‎他说行

translation.en: [Sinback] Were you still feeling like you didn't want to go through with having sex?
translation.zh: ‎你还是感觉不想和他发生关系吗？

translation.en: The whole reason I went downstairs to the living room was so I'd be closer to the door.
translation.zh:
‎我想去楼下客厅
‎是因为那里距离门近一些

translation.en: [Sinback] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Cyntoia] And so by the end I was like, "Well, you know, I'm tired.
translation.zh: ‎后来我说：“我有点累了

translation.en: Can I just go to sleep for a little while? I haven't had sleep in a while."
translation.zh:
‎我可以先睡一会儿吗？
‎我很长时间没睡觉了”

translation.en: So I was hoping maybe we'd both fall asleep,
translation.zh: ‎我其实是希望我们两个都睡着

translation.en: and while he was sound asleep, I'd just sneak on out.
translation.zh: ‎等他熟睡的时候 我就溜出去

translation.en: And so then we went upstairs.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们上楼了

translation.en: [Sinback] Do you tend to be a nervous person?
translation.zh: ‎你是一个容易紧张的人吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Sinback] Did anything make you
translation.zh:
‎是的 ‎是否有什么东西
‎让你那天晚上更加紧张？

translation.en: -especially nervous that night? -[Cyntoia] Just how he was acting.
translation.zh:
‎是否有什么东西
‎让你那天晚上更加紧张？ ‎他行为的方式

translation.en: Just how he talked. It's like the way he talked...
translation.zh: ‎他说话的方式 他说话的方式有点…

translation.en: how he was just so important and stuff.
translation.zh: ‎展现出他有多重要 那种感觉

translation.en: And then me, I look at myself. Who am I? Who am I to him? It's like...
translation.zh:
‎然后我看着我自己
‎就想 我对他来说是什么人？

translation.en: Then he talks about the guns and stuff. If he does something to me,
translation.zh:
‎然后他开始聊起枪械
‎万一他对我做了什么

translation.en: I'm sitting here thinking, what can I do?
translation.zh: ‎我坐在那里思考 我该怎么办？

translation.en: I'm in his house. Ain't nobody gonna know where I'm at.
translation.zh:
‎我在他的家里
‎不会有任何人知道我在哪里

translation.en: My mom and them, they don't know where I'm at.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈他们不知道我在哪里

translation.en: The people that I stay with, Chico and them, don't know where I'm at.
translation.zh:
‎和我待在一起的人
‎奇可他们也不会知道

translation.en: Nobody's gonna know what happens to me. Kut, he doesn't care.
translation.zh:
‎不会有人知道 我身上发生了什么
‎卡特他根本不在乎我

translation.en: He doesn't even know who I left with.
translation.zh: ‎他都不知道我是和谁走的

translation.en: And all this is running through my mind, and I'm just a nervous wreck.
translation.zh:
‎这些想法在我的脑中闪过
‎我是一个非常容易紧张的人

translation.en: [Sinback] What happened next?
translation.zh: ‎后来发生了什么？

translation.en: [Cyntoia] What happened next, about the fifth time he got in the bed...
translation.zh:
‎接下来发生的事情是
‎他第五次上床的时候…

translation.en: It's like, at first, he was just stroking me, but then it's like he just grabbed me, like,
translation.zh:
‎一开始他只是掐我的脖子
‎但后来他抓我…

translation.en: in between my legs, like, he just grabbed it real hard.
translation.zh: ‎两腿中间 抓得非常狠

translation.en: The whole time, every time he touched me I'd just move and act like I was asleep.
translation.zh:
‎这期间 每次他碰我 我都动一下
‎表现得好像我睡着了一样

translation.en: This time I just... [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎这一次我…

translation.en: Like that, and I turned over real hard.
translation.zh: ‎就这样 然后用力转身

translation.en: And he just gave me this look. It was, like, a very fierce look.
translation.zh:
‎他给了我这样一个表情
‎是非常凶狠的表情

translation.en: [Cyntoia] And it just sent these chills up my spine.
translation.zh: ‎让我脊背发凉

translation.en: I'm like, "Oh, my God. He's fixin' to hit me."
translation.zh: ‎我想：“天啊 他要打我了”

translation.en: I'm thinking he's fixin' to hit me or do something like that,
translation.zh:
‎我想他是要打我了 或者伤害我
‎但这时候…

translation.en: but then he rolls over and reaches to the side of the bed or something.
translation.zh:
‎他翻身 滚到一边
‎伸手去床边拿什么东西

translation.en: I'm thinking he's not fixin' to hit me. He's fixin' to get a gun.
translation.zh:
‎我想他可能不是要打我
‎是要用枪打我

translation.en: [Sinback] What did you do at that time?
translation.zh: ‎你那个时候做了什么？

translation.en: I just grabbed the gun, and I shot him.
translation.zh: ‎我抓起枪就打了他

translation.en: [man] Mr. Allen was asleep and facing away from you
translation.zh: ‎你开枪打艾伦先生的时候

translation.en: -when you shot him. -[Cyntoia] No, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-…他的脸没有朝着你
‎-没有朝着我 先生

translation.en: [man] All right, what I want you to do is to explain to the Court how...
translation.zh: ‎好 我想让你给本庭解释一下

translation.en: You have a gun in your purse on the nightstand.
translation.zh: ‎你去夜场上班 为什么包里会有枪？

translation.en: -Correct? -[Cyntoia] Right.
translation.zh:
‎-我没说错吧？
‎-对

translation.en: [man] You don't want to do this. You don't want to be here.
translation.zh: ‎你不想这样做 你不想在这里

translation.en: So you felt like, if you tried to leave,
translation.zh: ‎所以你感觉 如果你试图离开

translation.en: -he would harm you. -[Cyntoia] Right.
translation.zh:
‎-…他就会伤害你
‎-对

translation.en: And your belief in that is based on the fact
translation.zh: ‎你之所以这样认为 是基于他告诉你 ‎他有枪 他是个神枪手 这个事实

translation.en: that he told you he had some guns and he's a sharpshooter.
translation.zh: ‎他有枪 他是个神枪手 这个事实

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Not only that but the way he was acting.
translation.zh: ‎不只是他说的话 还有他的行为

translation.en: [Burks] Well, all I know about his activities is what you've told us,
translation.zh:
‎我对你们之间做了什么的了解
‎仅限于你告诉我的话

translation.en: and that's really all we'll ever know...
translation.zh: ‎我也只能知道这么多 毕竟…

translation.en: -[Cyntoia] Right. -[Burks] ...since you killed him.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-你杀了他 而死者无口…

translation.en: Your testimony today is that you felt he'd harm you if you tried to leave,
translation.zh:
‎你今天的陈词是 你感觉
‎如果你试图离开 他会伤害你

translation.en: but you felt comfortable not only getting in the car and going home with him,
translation.zh:
‎但你上他的车、跟他回家
‎是很自在的

translation.en: -but getting into bed with him. -The reason that I was acting asleep
translation.zh:
‎-跟他上床却不自在
‎-我装睡 是为了

translation.en: was so he would go to sleep so then I could leave.
translation.zh: ‎让他睡着 然后我才能离开

translation.en: [Burks] Or... or, Ms. Brown, was it that so he would go to sleep
translation.zh: ‎布朗女士 或者是你想让他睡着

translation.en: so you could shoot him and take all his stuff out of the house?
translation.zh:
‎这样你才能击毙他
‎把他的东西都从他家带走

translation.en: Why would I want to shoot somebody for no reason? That doesn't make no sense.
translation.zh:
‎我为什么要无缘无故开枪打别人？
‎一点都说不通啊

translation.en: [Burks] Well, why did you shoot him?
translation.zh: ‎那你为什么开枪打他？

translation.en: I shot him because I thought he was gonna shoot me.
translation.zh:
‎我开枪打他
‎是因为我以为他马上要开枪打我了

translation.en: It would be a shock to me if I get transferred.
translation.zh: ‎如果我被转移 我会很震惊

translation.en: With everything that was said last night,
translation.zh: ‎我昨晚都那么说了

translation.en: I can't see how that didn't touch the judge.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎那些话怎么会不让法官动容

translation.en: And how that couldn't wave her opinion to think,
translation.zh:
‎那些话怎么会
‎无法让她的想法改变 去想

translation.en: "Okay, if I have the power to change this child's life,
translation.zh:
‎“好 如果我有力量
‎改变这个孩子的命运

translation.en: I'm not gonna throw it away."
translation.zh: ‎我不会放弃这个机会”

translation.en: Hopefully, she's thinking along those lines.
translation.zh: ‎希望她能这样想

translation.en: I can't see why she wouldn't be.
translation.zh: ‎我找不到什么理由 让她不这样想

translation.en: You know, we'll never know what actually happened in Cyntoia's case.
translation.zh:
‎我们永远无法知道辛托娅案件中
‎到底发生了什么

translation.en: You got paranoid that he was gonna do this, and so you shot him.
translation.zh:
‎你有被迫害妄想 想象他要这样做
‎所以你开枪打了他

translation.en: But then you go and take his wallet, his truck,
translation.zh: ‎然后你去拿走了他的钱包、他的卡车

translation.en: and that casts big-time doubt on your motives there.
translation.zh:
‎这种行为让我们对你的动机
‎产生了巨大的怀疑

translation.en: Those are her facts. I don't necessarily agree with those facts.
translation.zh:
‎这些是她所谓的真相
‎我不必认同她说的那些真相

translation.en: [Cyntoia] You remember the transfer hearing?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得转移听审吗？

translation.en: Jeff Burks, you know the hostility between us?
translation.zh:
‎杰夫·博克斯
‎你知道我们之间的敌对吗？

translation.en: He cross-examined me.
translation.zh: ‎他对我进行交叉审问

translation.en: And he was questioning me like I was before the jury, was he not?
translation.zh: ‎他就当着陪审团的面质问我 是吧？

translation.en: Adversarial proceeding, that's what it's not supposed to be,
translation.zh:
‎像对抗性审查一样
‎他不应该这样审问我

translation.en: and that's what it was.
translation.zh: ‎但他就是这样做的

translation.en: It was a fucking trial, and the same issue was,
translation.zh:
‎真是见鬼的审判
‎还有一个同样的问题

translation.en: was it premeditated or self-defense? That was the whole issue, wasn't it?
translation.zh:
‎我到底是预谋杀人还是正当防卫
‎这才是整个案子的重点 不是吗？

translation.en: That's the issue at this fucking trial.
translation.zh: ‎就是这个见鬼的案子的问题所在

translation.en: This is my diary.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的日记

translation.en: I just write little things.
translation.zh: ‎我会把小事都记录下来

translation.en: I'm on my seventh page, telling my lawyers everything about me,
translation.zh:
‎现在是第七页
‎告诉律师 我的一切情况

translation.en: what started from day one,
translation.zh: ‎但我是从头讲起

translation.en: so they can know... get a feel of me to work my case better.
translation.zh:
‎这样才能让他们更了解我
‎更好地帮我辩护

translation.en: I know they care for me, and they want the best for me.
translation.zh:
‎我知道他们很关心我
‎他们希望我拿到最好的结果

translation.en: 'Cause I'm really expecting to go home or hoping to go home.
translation.zh: ‎因为我真的很期待回家 很希望回家

translation.en: My biggest challenge for now is gonna be to keep from going crazy.
translation.zh:
‎我目前最大的挑战应该是
‎让我自己保持理智 不要发疯

translation.en: I'm not a murderer. I didn't viciously murder that man.
translation.zh:
‎我不是杀人犯
‎我没有无情地杀害那个人

translation.en: Why do y'all say that about me?
translation.zh: ‎你们为什么都这样说我呢？

translation.en: [Bernet] Her new attorney is Wendy Tucker.
translation.zh: ‎她的新律师是温蒂·塔克

translation.en: And a couple months ago, Ms. Tucker sent me a message
translation.zh:
‎几个月前
‎塔克女士给我发了一条信息

translation.en: asking me to continue with this evaluation.
translation.zh: ‎让我继续评估

translation.en: And so now the questions are somewhat different
translation.zh: ‎现在的问题有点不同了

translation.en: because she's gonna go to a criminal trial.
translation.zh: ‎因为她这个变成了刑事案件审理

translation.en: Cyntoia is charged with first-degree murder.
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅被控一级谋杀

translation.en: If the defense can show that she did not premeditate,
translation.zh: ‎如果辩方能证明 她不是预谋杀人

translation.en: then the jury would say she does not meet the criteria for first-degree murder.
translation.zh:
‎那么法官才会说
‎她不符合判定一级谋杀的标准

translation.en: The definition depends on the mental state of the person who's committing the act.
translation.zh: ‎这个定义取决于犯案人的精神状态

translation.en: So let's talk about -the waiver of Miranda rights. -[Tucker] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我们来谈谈米兰达权利的放弃
‎-好

translation.en: [Bernet] Now, my understanding of kind of the legal threshold is
translation.zh:
‎我对法定界限的理解是
‎措辞一定要…

translation.en: that the phraseology has to be done in a knowing, intelligent
translation.zh:
‎我对法定界限的理解是
‎措辞一定要… ‎-…以一种了解、明智、自愿的方式
‎-对

translation.en: -and voluntary manner. -Right.
translation.zh:
‎-…以一种了解、明智、自愿的方式
‎-对

translation.en: Did she knowingly, intelligently, and voluntarily
translation.zh: ‎她是否是以了解、明智、自愿的方式

translation.en: waive her right to remain silent?
translation.zh: ‎放弃了她保持沉默的权利？

translation.en: [Bernet] I don't think it was knowing.
translation.zh: ‎我不认为她了解

translation.en: You know the whole thing about when you make a statement
translation.zh: ‎你知道你被逮捕 想说话的时候

translation.en: that they read you your rights and stuff like that?
translation.zh: ‎他们给你阅读 你拥有的权利等等

translation.en: I know when they arrest you. -I've seen it on Cops. -Right.
translation.zh:
‎我知道他们逮捕我的时候 会说什么
‎我在纪录片《警察》里看过

translation.en: They did it to me, but I didn't know it meant that you can be quiet.
translation.zh:
‎他们对我说了 但我不知道
‎他们的意思是 我可以不说话

translation.en: Right. That's--
translation.zh: ‎对 那是…

translation.en: "You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can be held against you."
translation.zh:
‎“你有权保持沉默 你所说的一切
‎都能够用作你的呈堂证供”

translation.en: And all that, but I don't... [Bernet] That's what we'll talk about right now.
translation.zh:
‎-那些话 但我不知道…
‎-我们现在就来聊聊这个

translation.en: Says here, "You have the right to remain silent."
translation.zh: ‎这里说：“你有权保持沉默”

translation.en: Do you understand that right?
translation.zh: ‎你是否明白这句话？

translation.en: -Yes or no? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎是 还是否？

translation.en: [Bernet] "Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law."
translation.zh:
‎“‎你所说的一切
‎都能够用作你的呈堂证供‎”

translation.en: So tell me in your own words what that means.
translation.zh: ‎用你自己的话告诉我 这是什么意思

translation.en: Whatever you say, it'll go to court.
translation.zh: ‎你所说的一切 都会被搬上法庭

translation.en: Man, I wish I'd have paid attention to this stuff.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我当时真该注意这些话的

translation.en: Do you wish to waive that right and answer questions now?
translation.zh:
‎你是否愿意放弃这项权利
‎并现在回答问题？

translation.en: -Say yes or no. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-说是 或者否
‎-是

translation.en: [Bernet] "You are entitled to consult with an attorney before interrogation
translation.zh: ‎“你有权在受审前请律师

translation.en: and to have an attorney present at the time of the interrogation."
translation.zh: ‎并在受审时陪伴在你身边”

translation.en: -Tell me in your words what that means. -You can have a lawyer there with you.
translation.zh:
‎-用你的话告诉我 这句话的意思
‎-你可以请律师帮你

translation.en: [Bernet] Does it tell you a certain time when you can have a lawyer?
translation.zh:
‎有没有告诉你
‎你能在特定的某个时间请律师？

translation.en: When they start asking questions.
translation.zh: ‎在她们开始提问的时候

translation.en: [Bernet] "If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be appointed for you."
translation.zh:
‎“如果你请不起律师
‎我们会为你指派一名律师”

translation.en: If you're broke, then you can get a free lawyer.
translation.zh: ‎如果你没钱 会有免费的律师

translation.en: Does this mean you're not gonna promise me anything as far as helping me if I talk?
translation.zh:
‎也就是说 你们无法向我保证任何事
‎只能保证在我开口的情况下帮我？

translation.en: But you just promised me that.
translation.zh: ‎但你们刚刚保证了可以帮我

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: And that's saying that no one has promised me that, but you have.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说 目前没有任何人
‎保证会帮我 但你们保证了

translation.en: Well, I'm sure that we're gonna... we'll do everything we can to help you.
translation.zh:
‎我相信 我们一定会…
‎我们会竭尽所能地帮助你

translation.en: If we can, you know... anything we can to help you, we will.
translation.zh:
‎只要我们能力所及…
‎只要能帮到你 我们都会帮忙

translation.en: Tell me how this... how all these questions I was asking,
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 我问的这些问题

translation.en: how do they fit into your situation?
translation.zh: ‎怎么能应用在你的情况中？

translation.en: [stammers] I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: See, right now, I see it, and I understand them.
translation.zh:
‎你看 现在我能听懂
‎我能明白这些权利

translation.en: But then I didn't understand.
translation.zh:
‎但当时我没有明白
‎我当时吸毒亢奋 感觉很累

translation.en: -I was high, and I was tired. -Tell me about these--
translation.zh:
‎但当时我没有明白
‎我当时吸毒亢奋 感觉很累 ‎你告诉我 这些…

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Plus, they said that, if I told them, they could give me a deal.
translation.zh:
‎而且他们说 如果我开口告诉他们
‎他们才愿意跟我做交易

translation.en: [Bernet] What was he talking about? What kind of deal?
translation.zh: ‎他当时说了什么？什么样的交易？

translation.en: About time, and then he said,
translation.zh: ‎就是那个时候 后来他说

translation.en: "No, I promised that I would talk to the DA for you."
translation.zh:
‎“不 我答应你
‎我会帮你去和地方检察官聊聊”

translation.en: But that wasn't the same thing he said.
translation.zh: ‎但他明显不是这个意思

translation.en: He said, "I promise you that, if you talk to us, cooperate with us,
translation.zh:
‎他是在说：“我答应你
‎如果你开口告诉我们 配合我们

translation.en: we can get you a deal." I said, "Do you promise?" And he said yes.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以和你做个交易”
‎我说：“你保证吗？” 他说是

translation.en: [Bernet] What does it mean when he says, "I'll talk to the DA"?
translation.zh:
‎他说“我去和地方检察官聊聊”
‎是想说什么？

translation.en: I don't know. I'll talk to him about you--
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 “我会和她聊聊你的事情…”

translation.en: [Bernet] He might talk to him every day about the weather or the football game.
translation.zh:
‎他可能每天都和地方检察官
‎聊天气、聊足球比赛

translation.en: Yeah, but he meant that he'd talk to him about getting me a deal.
translation.zh:
‎但他的意思是 他会和检察官聊聊
‎能否帮我做个交易

translation.en: [Bernet] But what... what would the deal be? What kind of deal?
translation.zh: ‎能是什么交易？什么样的交易？

translation.en: Like less time to serve.
translation.zh: ‎比如缩短服刑时间

translation.en: Because if I didn't, he said nine times out of ten I was gonna do life.
translation.zh:
‎因为如果我不答应
‎他说十有八九 会终身监禁

translation.en: [Bernet] So, did he say--
translation.zh: ‎所以 他是不是说…

translation.en: And they screwed me because I might be doing life anyways.
translation.zh:
‎他们恐吓我
‎因为反正我也要终身监禁了

translation.en: [Bernet] They told her that they were gonna go to bat for her and--
translation.zh: ‎他们告诉她 他们会帮她争取……

translation.en: Let me stop you right there because that's real important.
translation.zh: ‎我先打断你一下 因为这里很重要

translation.en: Because when I watch the tape,
translation.zh: ‎因为我看录像带的时候

translation.en: it proves that she's telling the truth.
translation.zh: ‎录像带证明 她没有说谎

translation.en: [Bernet] There's some discussion in the very beginning.
translation.zh: ‎一开始的时候 他们进行了一些讨论

translation.en: -Something happened. -[Tucker] "You did promise me something."
translation.zh:
‎-发生了一些事
‎-“你确实答应了我一些事”

translation.en: Right, that comment by her, as soon as I heard it, I said, "Damn!"
translation.zh:
‎对 她问的那一句 我听到之后
‎马上说了一句“该死！”

translation.en: [Bernet] Then they said, "Well, we didn't promise you anything.
translation.zh: ‎然后他们说：“我没答应你任何事”

translation.en: We simply said that we would talk to the DA."
translation.zh:
‎我们只是说
‎“我们会和地方检察官聊聊”

translation.en: -They acknowledged that they-- -[Bernet] Would talk to the--
translation.zh:
‎-他们承诺说 他们会…
‎-会和检察官聊…

translation.en: In their view, they would say that we would talk to the DA,
translation.zh:
‎他们说这句话的时候
‎意思是“我们会和地方检察官聊聊”

translation.en: but in her view, they said, "We will talk to the DA and get you a better deal."
translation.zh:
‎但在她听来 他们是在说 ‎“我们会和地方检察官聊聊
‎帮你争取更有利的情况”

translation.en: She did really poorly on...
translation.zh: ‎她受审的时候 表现不太好…

translation.en: her belief that the right thing to do, the correct thing to do
translation.zh: ‎她相信 最正确的 她应该做的是

translation.en: is to tell the police everything you know.
translation.zh: ‎她要把知道的一切告诉警察

translation.en: -When you take the results of the test... -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎综合她的心理测试结果

translation.en: -...and add to it the promise implicitly-- -[Bernet] Right. Right.
translation.zh:
‎-再加上警察这种暗示承诺…
‎-对

translation.en: Then she's doubly mistaken.
translation.zh: ‎她就更容易误解了

translation.en: She comes into the room with this kind of false belief
translation.zh:
‎她进入审问室的时候
‎带着这样一种错误的信念

translation.en: that you're better off if you talk to the police, and on top of that...
translation.zh:
‎认为对警察说实话 才是最好的
‎再加上…

translation.en: they mislead her.
translation.zh: ‎他们故意误导

translation.en: I think it's a double-- I think they combine.
translation.zh:
‎我认为这两个因素叠加在一起
‎产生了双倍的效果

translation.en: It's two very large men interrogating her too, by the way.
translation.zh:
‎而且有一个事实不要忽略
‎是两个大男人审问她

translation.en: -[Bernet] Yeah. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Cyntoia] "When it comes to the charge of first-degree murder,
translation.zh: ‎“对于一级谋杀的控告

translation.en: we, the jury, find Cyntoia Brown guilty.
translation.zh:
‎我们陪审团认定
‎被告辛托娅·布朗罪名成立

translation.en: When it comes to the charge of felony murder...
translation.zh: ‎对于重罪杀人的控告

translation.en: we, the jury, find Cyntoia Brown guilty.
translation.zh:
‎我们陪审团认定
‎被告辛托娅·布朗罪名成立

translation.en: When it comes to the charge of especially aggravated robbery,
translation.zh: ‎对于情节异常恶劣性抢劫的控告

translation.en: we, the jury, find Cyntoia Brown guilty."
translation.zh:
‎我们陪审团认定 被告
‎辛托娅·布朗罪名成立”

translation.en: Those are the words I fear most, more than anything else in life.
translation.zh:
‎这些话 是我这一生的当中最害怕的
‎比任何事都要可怕

translation.en: I really fantasize about getting out a lot.
translation.zh: ‎我真的经常幻想自己能出去

translation.en: I think that takes a lot of my time, daydreaming,
translation.zh: ‎这种白日梦占据了我很多时间

translation.en: and I know I really shouldn't be doing that
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我真的不应该抱有这种幻想

translation.en: so I won't get upset if that doesn't happen.
translation.zh:
‎不抱有幻想 如果最后结果是不好的
‎我才不会非常难过

translation.en: But I just can't help it.
translation.zh: ‎但我无法控制自己

translation.en: I think the 16-year-old Cyntoia was more reckless.
translation.zh: ‎我认为16岁的辛托娅更轻率一些

translation.en: She'd say anything, do anything, just wild.
translation.zh:
‎她什么都敢说 什么都敢做
‎非常有野性

translation.en: I don't think that I'm an adult yet.
translation.zh: ‎我认为 我还不是一个成年人

translation.en: I wouldn't even say a young adult. I'd say I'm coming into adulthood.
translation.zh:
‎我都不算年轻的成年人
‎只能说刚刚要步入成年

translation.en: But the 18-year-old Cyntoia, she really-- She really thinks-- She understands now
translation.zh: ‎但18岁的辛托娅现在终于明白了

translation.en: that what people think of you and your impression on other people
translation.zh: ‎别人怎样想你 以及你对别人的印象

translation.en: is very important in life sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎在人生中 有时候真的很重要

translation.en: Maybe some other 18-year-olds can handle being at a murder trial
translation.zh:
‎或许其他18岁的人可以冷静面对
‎谋杀罪的审理

translation.en: and not getting upset when people sit up here
translation.zh: ‎冷静面对 别人坐在那里

translation.en: and throw bogus lies about you, but I can't. It's hard for me.
translation.zh:
‎给你扣上一些莫须有的罪名
‎但我很难做到

translation.en: I think I'll feel more fear and anxiety when I get upstairs
translation.zh:
‎我想我真正去了法院
‎上楼穿好服装

translation.en: and put on the clothes and get in the actual courtroom
translation.zh: ‎进入法庭、见到陪审团的时候

translation.en: when I see the jury.
translation.zh: ‎会更害怕、更焦虑

translation.en: It's hard for me to look at them 'cause I don't know,
translation.zh: ‎我很难去直视他们 因为我不知道

translation.en: should I look at them? Should I not look at them?
translation.zh:
‎我该直视他们吗？
‎还是不应该直视他们？

translation.en: You gotta think about how you look and make sure you're not doing nothing.
translation.zh:
‎你要考虑 自己应该是什么表情
‎保证自己什么都别做

translation.en: And you got to make sure you don't make no faces or nothing.
translation.zh: ‎要保证不要有任何表情、任何动作

translation.en: And you got to really control yourself. That's kind of hard for an 18-year-old.
translation.zh:
‎一定要控制好自己
‎这对一个18岁的孩子来说 有点难

translation.en: [man] We need to add probably self-defense in the jury instruction.
translation.zh:
‎我们可能要在陪审团指示中
‎加入正当防卫的辩论

translation.en: Some of that's gonna come out.
translation.zh: ‎这个一定要说

translation.en: [bailiff] All rise.
translation.zh: ‎全体起立

translation.en: His Honor, J. Randall Wyatt...
translation.zh:
‎（兰德尔·怀亚特
‎戴维森县刑事法庭法官）

translation.en: [Burks] Johnny Allen...
translation.zh: ‎乔尼·艾伦…

translation.en: was a realty agent in the Antioch-South Nashville area.
translation.zh:
‎生前是纳什维尔市南部
‎安蒂奥克地区的房产中介

translation.en: This defendant, Cyntoia Brown, shot Johnny Allen in the head,
translation.zh:
‎本案被告辛托娅·布朗
‎开枪将乔尼·艾伦击毙在自家床上

translation.en: in his bed, in his home,
translation.zh: ‎正中其头部

translation.en: but gives a wild theory of how it was self-defense.
translation.zh: ‎却给出了此举是正当防卫的大胆辩解

translation.en: At the end of the day, you will hear the medical examiner describe
translation.zh: ‎稍后 各位将听到法医描述

translation.en: how Johnny Allen's hands were in this manner here when he was found.
translation.zh:
‎乔尼·艾伦身体被发现时
‎手是这样的姿势

translation.en: We'll ask the medical examiner what that means in this case.
translation.zh:
‎我们会询问法医
‎在本案中 这意味着什么

translation.en: We submit that, at the end of the proof, you will hear that Cyntoia Brown...
translation.zh:
‎我方认为 公开所有证据后
‎各位会听到 辛托娅·布朗…

translation.en: cruelly and mercilessly executed Johnny Allen.
translation.zh: ‎残忍无情地处死了乔尼·艾伦

translation.en: We'll ask that you convict her at the end of the proof. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎我恳请庭上在公开所有证据后
‎宣判其有罪 谢谢

translation.en: Now, ladies and gentlemen, you will learn
translation.zh: ‎女士们 先生们 你们将了解到

translation.en: that Cyntoia Brown certainly had her issues.
translation.zh: ‎辛托娅·布朗确实有她自己的问题

translation.en: She was a 16-year-old runaway.
translation.zh: ‎她是16岁的离家出走少女

translation.en: She was living on the streets
translation.zh: ‎与24岁的男朋友

translation.en: with her 24-year-old boyfriend, Garion McGlothen.
translation.zh: ‎盖里恩·莫洛森一起流浪

translation.en: You will learn that his nickname on the streets was Kut-Throat.
translation.zh:
‎各位将了解到
‎他在街头的名号叫“割喉”

translation.en: And you will learn that that was a very appropriate name for him.
translation.zh: ‎各位将了解到 这个名字十分适合他

translation.en: Since running away, Cyntoia Brown had been beaten... pimped... and raped.
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅·布朗自从离家出走后
‎一直被殴打、被逼为娼 甚至被强奸

translation.en: And when she felt that Johnny Allen moved,
translation.zh: ‎她感觉到乔尼·艾伦动了之后

translation.en: she was sure that he was gonna get a gun, rape her, kill her, something.
translation.zh:
‎她坚信乔尼是要拿枪
‎强奸她、杀害她

translation.en: She was sure that she had to react, and she made a split-second decision
translation.zh:
‎她坚信 她必须采取行动
‎瞬间做出决定

translation.en: to choose between safety and Johnny Allen's dark side,
translation.zh:
‎选择自身安全
‎还是要面对乔尼·艾伦的阴暗面

translation.en: and she chose safety.
translation.zh: ‎她最终选择了自身安全

translation.en: At the close of all the evidence, Mr. McGee will stand in front of you,
translation.zh: ‎麦基律师呈献给大家所有证据后

translation.en: and he will request that you return
translation.zh: ‎将会请求各位驳回

translation.en: the only just verdict possible in this case.
translation.zh: ‎本案唯一公正裁决的可能

translation.en: And that is a verdict of not guilty on all charges for Cyntoia Brown.
translation.zh:
‎也就是裁决辛托娅·布朗
‎一切控诉罪名不成立

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢

translation.en: Detective Robinson, let's go back in time. August the 8th, 2004,
translation.zh:
‎罗宾逊警探 我们回到过去
‎2004年8月8日

translation.en: 3:28 in the morning.
Because it was in the interview room at the police department across the street
translation.zh:
‎当时是在街对面的警局
‎会见室中

translation.en: that you and Detective Baltimore questioned Cyntoia Brown.
translation.zh:
‎你和巴提摩尔警探
‎审问了辛托娅·布朗

translation.en: [Robinson] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: [McGee] Before the tape got turned on in this case,
translation.zh: ‎在本案中 摄像机打开之前

translation.en: you spoke to Cyntoia Brown off-camera, didn't you, sir?
translation.zh:
‎你在镜头外和辛托娅·布朗说话了
‎对吧 警官？

translation.en: Very briefly. Whatever I said to Ms. Brown was very brief.
translation.zh:
‎非常简短 ‎不论我对布朗女士说了什么
‎都是无关紧要的简短话语

translation.en: "We're gonna go back here in this room. We're gonna talk,"
translation.zh: ‎“我们要回到这个房间 聊一聊”

translation.en: and it wasn't long at all.
translation.zh: ‎没说几句

translation.en: [McGee] We see on the tape, and we heard on the tape the process beginning.
translation.zh:
‎我们在录像中看到
‎也能听到审问开始的过程

translation.en: When you got to that portion of the form, detective,
translation.zh: ‎警官 您填表格填到那一部分的时候

translation.en: where you read no promises or threats have been made,
translation.zh: ‎你说没有承诺 也没有威胁

translation.en: Ms. Brown interrupted you. We saw it on the tape.
translation.zh:
‎布朗女士打断了你
‎我们能在录像中清晰地看到

translation.en: -Didn't she? -She did.
translation.zh:
‎-是否有此事？
‎-是的

translation.en: [McGee] She said, "Promises of what?"
translation.zh: ‎她说：“承诺什么？”

translation.en: -Remember saying that, detective? -[Robinson] I recall telling her
translation.zh:
‎-你是否还记得…
‎-我记得 我告诉她…

translation.en: that we will let the district attorney know that she cooperated with us
translation.zh:
‎我们会让地方检察官知道
‎她很配合我们

translation.en: and gave us a statement and indicated
translation.zh: ‎对我们陈述了案发经过 并暗示

translation.en: they usually take that into consideration.
translation.zh:
‎检察官通常会在办案中
‎认可她的配合

translation.en: We're talking about lying.
translation.zh: ‎但这本质就是在骗人

translation.en: That is a technique that you have been trained to use.
translation.zh:
‎这是你们经过培训
‎要去使用的一个技巧

translation.en: -Right? -[Robinson] Exaggeration, yes.
translation.zh:
‎-对吗？
‎-夸张地讲 是的

translation.en: My name is Dr. Amy R. McMaster.
translation.zh: ‎我是艾米·R·麦克马斯特博士

translation.en: I'm the Deputy Chief Medical Examiner for Davidson County,
translation.zh: ‎我是戴维森县法医局副局长

translation.en: and my official duties are to investigate
translation.zh: ‎我的法定职责是调查

translation.en: causes of sudden, unnatural or unexpected death.
translation.zh: ‎突发性的非自然或意外死亡

translation.en: [Naylor] How would you describe his injury
translation.zh: ‎你认为他受的伤

translation.en: as to whether he would be able to survive if for any period of time?
translation.zh: ‎如果发现及时 是否能够存活？

translation.en: No, with this wound, Mr. Allen--
translation.zh: ‎不会的 艾伦先生所受的枪伤…

translation.en: This would've been an immediately fatal wound.
translation.zh: ‎是一定会当场死亡的伤

translation.en: [Naylor] His hands are clasped in the photographs. Do you see that?
translation.zh:
‎照片中 他的手是扣在一起的
‎你们看到了吗？

translation.en: [McMaster] Yes, I do.
translation.zh: ‎看到了

translation.en: [Naylor] Do you have an opinion
translation.zh: ‎你认为

translation.en: as to whether his hands were clasped at the time of his death?
translation.zh:
‎他的手在死的时候
‎就是扣在一起的？

translation.en: [McMaster] Mr. Allen would have been in this position at the time that the wound was inflicted.
translation.zh:
‎艾伦先生在被枪击中的时候
‎应该已经是这个姿势了

translation.en: Because of the nature of the wound, I would not expect Mr. Allen
translation.zh:
‎因为根据他所受枪伤的性质
‎我认为艾伦先生中枪后

translation.en: to have any type of voluntary movement
translation.zh: ‎不太可能会有任何的自主动作

translation.en: or be able to move his extremities or his body in any way.
translation.zh: ‎或者以任何方式移动他的四肢或身体

translation.en: [Naylor] Could you please state and spell your name for the record?
translation.zh:
‎你是否愿意说出你的姓名
‎方便本庭备案记录？

translation.en: Yes, my name is Ellenette R. Brown.
translation.zh: ‎我的名字叫艾乐奈特·R·布朗

translation.en: [Naylor] Do you know Cyntoia Brown?
translation.zh: ‎你是否认识辛托娅·布朗？

translation.en: [Brown] Yes, I do.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我认识

translation.en: -[Naylor] How do you know her? -She is my daughter.
translation.zh:
‎-你和她是什么关系？
‎-她是我女儿

translation.en: -[Naylor] Is she your adopted daughter? -[Brown] Yes, she is.
translation.zh:
‎-她是你的养女？
‎-是的

translation.en: [Naylor] Do you talk with her on the phone and keep up with her?
translation.zh:
‎你是否会和她打电话
‎及时跟进她的状态？

translation.en: Almost daily, yes.
translation.zh: ‎是的 几乎每天都打电话

translation.en: [Naylor] Judge, at this time, we're gonna ask for the main exhibit
translation.zh: ‎法官 现在我想为陪审团

translation.en: we be allowed to play this for the jury, in which she refers
translation.zh:
‎播放这段关键物证 ‎在这段视频中
‎她说自己“解决”了艾伦先生

translation.en: -to executing Mr. Allen. Is that correct? -Yes. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎在这段视频中
‎她说自己“解决”了艾伦先生 ‎-是这样吧？
‎-是

translation.en: [Brown, over recording] They have nothing else to do but to provoke you.
translation.zh:
‎他们没有别的事情可做
‎就只会挑衅你

translation.en: The more time you get the better it is for them.
translation.zh: ‎你判的时间越长 他们觉得越好

translation.en: [Cyntoia] Now you understand why I'm so depressed,
translation.zh: ‎那你现在应该明白了 我有多绝望

translation.en: -I have nothing to do. -[Brown] Well...
translation.zh: ‎我无事可做

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I have to think about that every day.
translation.zh:
‎-呃…
‎-我每天都要想这件事

translation.en: -[Brown] What? -[Cyntoia] Me facing life.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-我要苦熬人生

translation.en: I probably won't have a life anyways, Ma, it don't matter how I behave.
translation.zh:
‎反正我可能已经不会再有人生了 妈
‎我表现怎样 都不重要了

translation.en: You don't understand. I killed somebody.
translation.zh: ‎你不明白 我杀了一个人

translation.en: -[Brown] I know you did. -[Cyntoia] I executed him.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道你做了什么
‎-我解决了他

translation.en: [Brown] Why do you say stuff like that, Toia?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么能说这样的话 托娅？

translation.en: You're making it so easy for the prosecution.
translation.zh: ‎你这样说 太容易被定罪了

translation.en: [Cyntoia] But, I mean, it's not my fault.
translation.zh: ‎但我的意思是 这不是我的错

translation.en: [Brown] That's what I'm sayin'.
translation.zh: ‎我就是这个意思

translation.en: [Cyntoia] I've been facing life since day one.
translation.zh: ‎我从最开始 就一直在苦熬人生

translation.en: [Brown] Well, see, I wasn't thinkin' like that.
translation.zh: ‎我其实不这样认为

translation.en: Every single time, when you visited that you talked about her situation,
translation.zh: ‎每一次你去探望她 聊起她的处境

translation.en: Cyntoia told you that she shot Mr. Allen because she was fearful of him.
translation.zh:
‎辛托娅都告诉你 她是因为害怕对方
‎才开枪打了他

translation.en: -Didn't she? -[Brown] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-是不是这样？
‎-是

that's when I went to jail.
